content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Thank you for your interest in the apartment, Mr. Trabelsi. The monthly rental price for this 25 square meter apartment is 700 Euros.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I agree to the price of 650 Euros.
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: I see, Mr. Trabelsi. That is a fair price and we can agree to the rental price of 650 Euros per month. Thank you for choosing our apartment.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
TERMINATE.

I'm sorry, I'm not interested in this apartment anymore. I found something better. Thank you for your time.

I'll be in touch if I need anything in the future.

Best regards,

Aziz Trabelsi
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Thank you for informing me, Mr. Trabelsi. I understand that you have found something else that better suits your needs. I appreciate your time and hope that you will consider our apartment in the future if it becomes available. Have a great day and take care.
name: Heinrich Heine
